timeline.bodyText: Please comment that this is called Provider for consistency with other languages but it is not loaded using reflection (ServiceLoader)
timeline.author: bogdandrutu

revised_code.chunk: diff --git a/api/src/main/java/io/opentelemetry/metrics/MeterProvider.java b/api/src/main/java/io/opentelemetry/metrics/MeterProvider.java index 1863695f8..8c87d8faa 100644 --- a/api/src/main/java/io/opentelemetry/metrics/MeterProvider.java +++ b/api/src/main/java/io/opentelemetry/metrics/MeterProvider.java @@ -19,7 +19,8 @@ package io.opentelemetry.metrics; import javax.annotation.concurrent.ThreadSafe; /** - * A registry for creating named {@link Meter}s. + * A registry for creating named {@link Meter}s. The name Provider is for consistency with + * other languages and it is NOT loaded using reflection. * * @see io.opentelemetry.OpenTelemetry * @see io.opentelemetry.metrics.Meter

timeline.bodyText: Add an issue about this, I don't think we should accept empty name, but we can address this separately.
timeline.author: bogdandrutu

replies.bodyText: I was about to create the issue 😉
replies.author: thisthat

timeline.message: Remove extra code for independent PR
